languages.text: "Поверить не могу, что собственными руками отбил ксеноартефакты у одного контрабандиста в пользу другого". {n}Хейнрикс кривит губы, с отвращением осматривая содержимое контейнера.{/n} "Уверен, Вольный Торговец знает, что делает, и к каким последствиям может привести {mf|его|ее} "дружба" с подобными личностями".

"I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."
languages.original_text: "Поверить не могу, что собственными руками отбил ксеноартефакты у одного контрабандиста в пользу другого". {n}Хейнрикс кривит губы, с отвращением осматривая содержимое контейнера.{/n} "Уверен, Вольный Торговец знает, что делает, и к каким последствиям может привести {mf|его|ее} "дружба" с подобными личностями".

traits.locale_text: "I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artifacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader is aware of what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

"I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artifacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader is aware of what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

"I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

"I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

"I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

languages.text: “我真不敢相信，我居然刚刚从一个走私者那里，替另一个走私者查获了一批异形造物。”{n}海因里希嘴唇扭曲着，厌恶地检查着箱子里的东西。{/n}“我相信，行商浪人知道自己在做什么， 也知道结交这样的‘朋友’可能会带来怎样的后果。”
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

traits.locale_text: “我真不敢相信，我居然刚刚从一个走私者那里，替另一个走私者查获了一批异形造物。”{n}海因里希嘴唇扭曲着，厌恶地检查着箱子里的东西。{/n}“我相信，行商浪人知道自己在做什么， 也知道结交这样的‘朋友’可能会带来怎样的后果。”

languages.text: «No me puedo creer que acabe de interceptar un cargamento de xenoartefactos de un contrabandista que trabaja para otro». {n}Los labios de Heinrix se curvan con desprecio mientras inspecciona el contenido de la caja.{/n} «Seguro que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente sabe lo que hace y las consecuencias de relacionarse con "amigos" así».
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

traits.locale_text: «No me puedo creer que acabe de interceptar un cargamento de xenoartefactos de un contrabandista que trabaja para otro». {n}Los labios de Heinrix se curvan con desprecio mientras inspecciona el contenido de la caja.{/n} «Seguro que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente sabe lo que hace y las consecuencias de relacionarse con "amigos" así».

languages.text: 「他の密輸人の代わりに別の密輸人の異種族のアーティファクトの貨物を押収するとは信じられん」{n}ハインリックスは、箱の中身を嫌悪感を露わにして調べながら口を歪める。{/n}「自由開拓者は今の状況、そしてこういう『お友達』を作ればどういう事になるか分かっているのだろうね」
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

traits.locale_text: 「他の密輸人の代わりに別の密輸人の異種族のアーティファクトの貨物を押収するとは信じられん」{n}ハインリックスは、箱の中身を嫌悪感を露わにして調べながら口を歪める。{/n}「自由開拓者は今の状況、そしてこういう『お友達』を作ればどういう事になるか分かっているのだろうね」

languages.text: "Ich kann nicht glauben, dass ich gerade eine Lieferung Xeno-Artefakte von einem Schmuggler konfisziert habe, aber für einen anderen." {n}Heinrix verzieht die Lippen als er angewidert den Inhalt der Kiste untersucht.{/n} "Ich bin sicher, {mf|der Freihändler weiß, was er|die Freihändlerin weiß, was sie} tut, und kennt die Konsequenzen derartiger 'Freundschaften'."
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nicht glauben, dass ich gerade eine Lieferung Xeno-Artefakte von einem Schmuggler konfisziert habe, aber für einen anderen." {n}Heinrix verzieht die Lippen als er angewidert den Inhalt der Kiste untersucht.{/n} "Ich bin sicher, {mf|der Freihändler weiß, was er|die Freihändlerin weiß, was sie} tut, und kennt die Konsequenzen derartiger 'Freundschaften'."

languages.text: « J'ai du mal à croire que je viens de saisir un chargement de xéno-artefacts à une contrebandière pour le compte d'{mf|un|une} autre. » {n}Heinrix fait la moue en examinant le contenu de la boîte avec dégoût.{/n} « Je ne doute pas un instant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sait ce qu'{mf|il|elle} fait ou ce qu'{mf|il|elle} encourt à se faire ce genre d'amis. »
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai du mal à croire que je viens de saisir un chargement de xéno-artefacts à une contrebandière pour le compte d'{mf|un|une} autre. » {n}Heinrix fait la moue en examinant le contenu de la boîte avec dégoût.{/n} « Je ne doute pas un instant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sait ce qu'{mf|il|elle} fait ou ce qu'{mf|il|elle} encourt à se faire ce genre d'amis. »

languages.text: "Az önce bir kaçakçı adına başka bir kaçakçının zeno eserlerine el koyduğuma inanamıyorum." {n}Heinrix, kutunun içindekileri iğrenerek incelerken dudak büküyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, ne yaptığını ve böyle 'arkadaşlar' edinmenin doğurabileceği sonuçları biliyordur."
languages.original_text: "I can't believe I've just seized a shipment of xeno-artefacts from one smuggler on behalf of another." {n}Heinrix's lip curls as he examines the contents of the box with disgust.{/n} "I'm sure that the Rogue Trader knows what {mf|he|she}'s doing and of the consequences that might result from making 'friends' like these."

traits.locale_text: "Az önce bir kaçakçıdan bir başkası adına zeno eserlerine el koyduğuma inanamıyorum." {n}Heinrix'in dudağı, iğrenerek kutunun içindekileri incelerken bükülüyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in ne yaptığını ve böyle 'arkadaşlar' edinmenin doğurabileceği sonuçları bildiğinden şüphem yok."
